siteMetadata.name: Naaman Tan
siteMetadata.title: Naaman Tan | Software Engineer
siteMetadata.description: Computer Science undergraduate with experience in full-stack development and NLP, CV and Geometric DL. If you need an engineer who can quickly prototype concepts and scale them up, I could be the person you’re looking for.
siteMetadata.about:
Hi! My name is Naaman. I'm a fourth year student studying Computer Science and Economics at the National University of Singapore.
      I used to study engineering. But three unhappy semesters and a couple of robotics projects convinced me to take a leap of faith and study Computer science instead, and I've never looked back since. I've spent a lot of my time in university focused on deep learning systems and its adjacent fields - computer vision, natural language processing, graph machine learning, database systems, distributed systems etc., and I think it's pretty neat.
      Beyond computer science, I spend my time reading books, playing badminton and watching movies.

projects.name: NUS Notes and Reviews (Ongoing)
projects.description: A collection of my notes and reviews of the classes I take at NUS.

projects.name: Oxford Map The System 2021
projects.description: Map The System is a global competition that challenges teams to use a system's thinking approach to analyse socio-economic problems and propose solutions. I led an interdiscplinary team of 5 to investigate how meritocracy in Singapore worsens inequality. We won the national finals in May and placed 2nd in the global finals.

projects.name: DJI RoboMaster Robotics Competition 2021
projects.description:
Led a team of 5 in developing 3 Standard Robots. Spearheaded design and implementation of object detection algorithms and mechanical launcher, gimbal and mobility systems.
          Team placed 4th globally (1st in SEA) for RoboMasters University Championship Online Competition.

projects.name: Asian Development Bank #DigitalAgainstCovid19 Hackathon 2020
projects.description:
Led a team of four in prototyping a integrated waste management solution based on p2p services and a waste-classification machine learning model. Drew a wireframe in Figma and implemented a simple image classification model based on MobileNet.
          Our team was a Top 10 finalist among 140+ international teams.

projects.name: Shell ITF Scenarios Competition 2020
projects.description: Led a team of five in collaboration with faculty members from LKYSPP in charting out how different energy scenarios would impact Asia and the Middle East.

experience.name: Hypotenuse AI
experience.description: Full-Stack Software Engineer Intern, May 2022 - Aug 2022
